name: Naturally a disaster
description:
Naturally a disaster was my first 3D project.

The game is a diorama-style PC simulation game. 3 populations exist on an island: plantlife, predators, and herbivores (trees, monsters, and rabbits):

The populations will move around, reproduce, and eat each other by themselves. The player has a bird’s-eye view of the island and can freely move their view to any angle above sea-level.

The player’s objective is to balance the populations through the use of natural disasters, so that they remain stable for as long as possible. If any of the three populations exceeds a certain threshold or goes extinct, the player fails.
